ygData.subject: Question about Brass Instruments and the Cinda's Charismatic Carillon?
ygData.msgSnippet: I was wondering where I could buy a brass instrument (there doesn t seem to be any in Kelethin, a minotaur horn isn t a brass instrument so I assume that the
ygData.messageBody:
I was wondering where I could buy a brass instrument (there doesn't seem to
be any in Kelethin, a minotaur horn isn't a brass instrument so I assume
that the regular horn in the guild shop isn't one either) and what is the
TRUE use of Cinda's Charismatic Carillon? I know you have to target
yourself, but the song keeps ended after one pulse. Is it supposed to do
that? I haven't seen any improvement in merchant prices either, is that
maybe I don't have a brass instrument equipped when I sing it? Are you
supposed to click on the merchant when you have the song icon in the active
spells area?
